item.title: Total Fuel Quantity Indication – Center Tank Fuel Quantity Indicator Inoperative

numlitem.para: Main tank fuel quantity indicators are operative, and
Center tank fuel quantity indicator is considered inoperative.

note.para: Additional deferral required – Fuel Tank Quantity Indication Systems (Flight Deck) – Center Tank Indicator Inop.

numlitem.para: Check main tank fuel quantity is sufficient for flight.
Fuel Log is required for flight.

placard.para: Placard Total Fuel Quantity Indication "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
